channel.title: HIP HOP PATRIOTS PODCAST
channel.description: Hip Hop Patriots is a podcast that is devoted to non partisan political analysis mixed with current hip hop.

item.title: HHP RADIO VOL 2
item.description: HIP HOP PATRIOTS SHOW – VOL 2 1. JOE BUDDEN- TOUCH N GO 2. 50 CENT- WHEN IT ALL GOES DOWN 3. CHRIS BROWN, WIZ KHALIFA- BOMB 4. DJ KHALED, LIL WAYNE, ROZAY, DRAKE- IM ON ONE 5. DR.DRE, SWIZZ BEATS- CHILLIN 6. DRAKE BABY COME WITH ME 7. FABOLOUS, LIL WAYNE- THAT’S NOT LOVE 8. ACE HOOD- GO GET IT 9. STYLES P, JADAKISS- ITS OK 10. LIL WAYNE – ONE NIGHT ONLY 11. NAS- NASTY 12. NAS- REPRESENT 13. TI, BOB – WE DON’T DO IT LIKE YALL
